title: permma banned chat logs, i'm quiting league.
body:
for the first time in league i've become so toxic i can't even think, when a team won't ff and puts everyone through hell, i'm just done with it. thanks for taking any report i've ever sent into nothing. 


Game 1
tinytree68: what are your ganks
tinytree68: this vi
tinytree68: i'll refer to my allies as w/.e io want
tinytree68: you fucking peace of shit
tinytree68: when someone ganks my lane and they just run through and do nothing
tinytree68: yea i'll call them whatever i want
tinytree68: fucking idot
tinytree68: i'm going gp mid with a swain top and vi into a voli
tinytree68: with a malphite into a soraka
tinytree68: ok
tinytree68: then do it
tinytree68: so far you've been at tower for 6mins
tinytree68: called it
tinytree68: i'm glad we lost this game
tinytree68: cause you fed her and swain died to her so idc
tinytree68: is this swain really talking
tinytree68: mate you fed her kills then i get raped cause of it
tinytree68: so stfu
tinytree68: i'll come feed top for oyu
tinytree68: k
tinytree68: i'll just feed then since you clearly are all premades
tinytree68: %%%gots
tinytree68: did i say i was good?
tinytree68: oh right
tinytree68: i didn't
tinytree68: so stfu
tinytree68: makes so much since
tinytree68: yo uare so stupid
tinytree68: fuck you malp
tinytree68: can't wait till someone shoots you up while you are walking to school
tinytree68: fucking stupid %%%%%%s
tinytree68: go kys your malphite
tinytree68: see what happens to the naked eye? these fuckers are assholes
tinytree68: but report me ya'll just bitches anyway
tinytree68: this team is the reason we have a colored section in schools
tinytree68: you're stupid
tinytree68: stupid %%%%%%
tinytree68: at least one %%%%%% is stupid
tinytree68: you're pure stupid
tinytree68: you really think i'm gonna help you vi
tinytree68: probably stole the computer
tinytree68: reporting swain for being black
tinytree68: don't talk to white men like that
tinytree68: black is are bitch
tinytree68: fuck you tunder %%%%
tinytree68: i'm not racist you %%%%
tinytree68: stfu you %%%%%%
tinytree68: a titanc hydra you dumb fuck
tinytree68: swain is going to die
tinytree68: when i lynch him
tinytree68: stupid black kid
tinytree68: cause you black
tinytree68: all black people talk shit but can't back it up
tinytree68: thats why they are in jail
tinytree68: cops get sick of them
tinytree68: and we shoot some
tinytree68: like this swain
tinytree68: you are just a %%%%%% no one needs to explain things to you
tinytree68: i'm mexican you stupid fuck

Game 2
tinytree68: LOL
tinytree68: no
tinytree68: don't come bot
tinytree68: or you will have no jg
tinytree68: test me
tinytree68: so learn to e
tinytree68: and q
tinytree68: yasuo you are shit
tinytree68: yasuo
tinytree68: you are shit
tinytree68: say quesiton mark again
tinytree68: nd see  what i do
tinytree68: build soulstealer vlad
tinytree68: we got a cocky stupid jungle
tinytree68: are junlger is stupid
tinytree68: you guys are gonna get fed
tinytree68: wants to act like he can't read
tinytree68: nope
tinytree68: fuck this team
tinytree68: i told him to test me
tinytree68: he did
tinytree68: so suffer
tinytree68: everyone
tinytree68: feed everyone
tinytree68: i just fucking told you
tinytree68: literally reporting cho and yasuo for stupidty
tinytree68: dw you can win are yasuo can't eq
tinytree68: vlad watch out
tinytree68: yasuo is coming
tinytree68: now he's coming bot
tinytree68: he can't spin on your so dw
tinytree68: he is lvl 5 with yasuo and can't eq
tinytree68: least i can fight
tinytree68: you literally just q and q and q throw wind
tinytree68: you talk i wil lreport you
tinytree68: you are feeding
tinytree68: so go ahead report me child
tinytree68: most useless jungler na
tinytree68: we have a yasuo jungler
tinytree68: and yoou are asking em why i'm feeding
tinytree68: you and yasuo are the reason i would shoot a white kid
tinytree68: yasuo isn't there
tinytree68: he only knows how to q
tinytree68: and w
tinytree68: like i said
tinytree68: i would have played great if we had a real jungler
tinytree68: so stfu zed
tinytree68: the fact he's 5 and can't even eq
tinytree68: is tilted enough
tinytree68: cause i'm better than you
tinytree68: so stfu
tinytree68: and?
tinytree68: come fight me after i'll fuck you both up 1v2
tinytree68: k zed
tinytree68: lol
tinytree68: yup
tinytree68: cool more trolling
tinytree68: haha
tinytree68: LOL

Game 3
tinytree68: 4 mid
tinytree68: push the tower
tinytree68: what are you doing
tinytree68: you and sona literally stood there for 2mins doing nothing
tinytree68: yes 2mins i have things timestamped
tinytree68: yes
tinytree68: 6:08 to 8:08
tinytree68: learn to play then
tinytree68: mute me bitch
tinytree68: idc i'll just feed
tinytree68: elise
tinytree68: build a soulstealer and camp mid
tinytree68: cool
tinytree68: been ganked twice, junlge nad bot lane nothing done
tinytree68: yup
tinytree68: that bad
tinytree68: yeah please do that
tinytree68: have fun 4v5ing bitch

replies.body: You deserved it. If you're not willing to change, all I have to say is: Good riddance.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRitual,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6wlkPzcs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-28T23:52:16.166+0000)
>
> You deserved it. If you're not willing to change, all I have to say is: Good riddance.

was my first time toxic, wish it showed what they say. but liberals like you. peace
Uhh you were EXTREAMLY racist in game 1 I'd perma ban for that any day.
Permabanned for first time toxicity? I smell bullshit, and lots of it.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRitual,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6wlkPzcs,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2016-06-29T12:23:03.521+0000)
>
> Permabanned for first time toxicity? I smell bullshit, and lots of it.

Nah. The first log itself is enough to warrant escalation.

Not for toxicity, but for homophobic and racist remarks, yeah.

As I said earlier, good riddance to bad rubbish.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRitual,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6wlkPzcs,comment-id=00010000000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-29T12:50:23.524+0000)
>
> Not for toxicity, but for homophobic and racist remarks, yeah.
> 
> As I said earlier, good riddance to bad rubbish.

I can believe it. I almost cut loose after a super bad game with a feeder and two teams who wouldn't end the game.
Good to hear a toxic player is leaving the game.

> [{quoted}](name=dadimplayingrn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6wlkPzcs,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-06-29T01:04:23.133+0000)
>
> clearly can't read

Clearly cannot spell or convey what you a trying to say properly. Glad we got ourselves another freeloading far left wing lunatic permanently removed from League of Legends. This gets me so stoked every time. Thanks for freeing up more space for me and fellow conservatives to thrive.
